required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Acute Kidney Injury in Patients With CoVID-19
clinical_study.official_title: The Effect of Acute Kidney Injury on Prognosis in Patients Hospitalised for COVID-19.

brief_summary.textblock: We aimed to investigate the effect of Acute Kidney Injury (AKİ) on the prognosis of patients hospitalised for COVID-19.

detailed_description.textblock: The effect of Acute Kidney Injury (AKİ) on the prognosis of patients hospitalised for COVID-19. Patients hospitalised for COVID-19 and acute kidney injury will be enrolled. The duration of hospitalisation, mortality rates will be compared in COVID-19 patients with and without acute kidney injury.

primary_outcome.description: mortality rates of COVID-19 patients with and without Acute Kidney Injury
time between admission to hospital and discharge for COVID-19 patients with and without Acute Kidney Injury

arm_group.arm_group_label: COVID-19 patients with acute kidney injury
arm_group.description: COVID-19 patients with acute kidney injury

arm_group.arm_group_label: COVID-19 patients without acute kidney injury
arm_group.description: COVID-19 patients without acute kidney injury

intervention.description: duration of hospitalization, mortality rates of patients hospitalised for COVID-19 evaluated and compared in patients with and without acute kidney injury.
intervention.arm_group_label: COVID-19 patients with acute kidney injury
COVID-19 patients without acute kidney injury

study_pop.textblock: Patients hospitalised for COVID-19 with and without acute kidney injury

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Patients hospitalised with COVID-19.
- Patients hospitalised with COVID-19 with Acute Kidney Injury
Exclusion Criteria:
-
